loans.name: Mirna

texts.es: Mirna, de 46 años, es una buena mujer, es una madre ejemplar y muy corajuda, esta separada de su esposo con quien tuvo cinco hijos a quienes saco adelante gracias a su esfuerzo y sacrificio diario, tres de sus hijos ya son mayores mientras que dos son aun menores y depende de ella, ella vive en una casa propia a lado de sus dos menores hijos y una hija mayor quien es madre soltera de un menor de 5 años. El trabajo de Mirna consiste en la venta de pescado fresco, sale temprano al puerto en busca de los pescados más gordos y frescos, tiene que andar mucho ya que en algunas ocasiones no logra llegar a tiempo y tiene que ir al mercado de su ciudada a comprar, de ahí se va su casa en donde arma aun pequeña mesa e inicia con su venta, lleva trabajando así por un año, pues antes se dedicaba a muchas cosas pero no le daban tiempo para estar con sus hijos. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que le permite estar en su casa la mayoría del tiempo, además de tener su tiempo libre por las tardes que utiliza para poder hacer otras actividades, además gana bien, le gustaría mas adelante tener una tienda en su casa para que signifique un ingreso más a su economía. Este será el primer préstamo con MFP, esta muy contenta de saber que le brindarán la oportunidad de invertir y le dan la confianza para que pueda demostrar que es buena y muy responsable. Con el monto solicitado, comprará pescado en mayor cantidad para tener en su congeladora y no gastar en pasaje todos los días, además comprará algunas frutas para empezar a vender en su casa.
texts.en:
Mirna, 46, is a good woman--she is an exemplary and courageous mother.  She is separated from her husband, with whom she had five children, who got  ahead thanks to their daily efforts and sacrifice.  Three of her children are already grown up, while two of them are minors and depend on her.   She lives in her own house with her youngest children and an older daughter, who is the single mother of a five-year-old boy.  Mirna sells fresh fish.  She goes to the port early in the morning to find the freshest and fattest fish.  It's a long walk, and sometimes she doesn't get there in time, so she has to go to the nearest city market to buy her fish.  From there, she goes to her house, where she sets out a little table and starts selling.  She has been doing this work for a year, as before this, she did a variety of jobs, but they did not give her enough time with her children.  She likes the fact that her work allows her to be home most of the time, plus she has free time in the afternoons to do other things.  In addition, she is earning well.  

In the future, she would like to have a shop in her own home so she can earn more.  This will be her first loan with microfinance partner MFP.  She is pleased to have this investment opportunity, and it is giving her the confidence to show how good and responsible she is.  With the funding, she will buy a greater quantity of fish to keep in her freezer and will not waste time and money traveling every day.  She will also buy some fruit to start selling from her house.

loans.use: to buy fish and fruit for resale.

loans.name: Noemi

texts.es: Noemi, de 34 años, es una mujer buena, amable y muy emprendedora. Vive con su pareja con quien tiene cuatro hijos de 18, 15, 6 y 3 años, ellos estudian y ayudan en las cosas del hogar. Tiene una casa propia en donde comparte sus días a lado de su conviviente y sus cuatro hijos quienes son el motivo de esfuerzo y sacrificio ya que ella trabaja mucho para poder brindarles lo mejor. EL trabajo de Noemi consiste en la venta de abarrotes y otros productos, ella tiene una pequeña tienda en donde desde muy temprano abre en espera de sus clientes quienes van muy seguido pues tienen la seguridad que siempre encontraran lo que buscan, trabaja sola y lo hace en este negocio ya por cuatro años. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que le da el tiempo para poder realizar algunas cosas más, como preparar sus refrescos para venderlos, hacer helados y todo tipo de negocio que ella cree que pueda sacar alguna ganancia. Cuando empezó no tenia ni idea de cómo era este negocio y se lanzo sin saber nada, espera poder ampliar su negocio, pues ella sabe muy bien que mientras más grande sea, mejor ganancia tendrá. Este será el préstamo número 5 con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos. De igual manera de los préstamos recibidos anteriormente se compromete a ser un cliente puntual y muy responsable. Con el monto solicitado, comprará más mercadería para vender en su tienda, entre ellos, gaseosas, conservas, lácteos, bebidas y mas.
texts.en: Noemi is 34 years old. She is a good, friendly and enterprising woman. She lives with her spouse, with whom she has four children, aged 18, 15, 6 and 3. They go to school and help with the housework. She owns her own house where she shares her days with her spouse and their four children who are they reason for her hard work and sacrifice, since she works a lot to be able to offer them the best. Noemi's work consists of selling groceries and other products. She has a small store which she opens very early to await customers who go there frequently because they know she will find what they are looking for. She works alone and she has been in this business for four years. What she likes about this work is that it gives her time to do some other things, such as make beverages to sell, and make ice cream and any other thing she thinks that she can make some profit with. When she started, she had no idea what kind of business this was and she opened it knowing nothing. She hopes to be able to expand her business, because she knows that the bigger it is, the more profit she will have. This will be loan number 5 with MFP, and she hopes for your cooperation to continue with her goals. As with the loans she received previously, she is committed to being a punctual and responsible client. With the amount she has asked for, she will buy more merchandise to sell in her store, among them soft drinks, preserves, dairy products, beverages and more.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, preserves, dairy products and beverages.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to install security grilles at the windows of her home

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Sango W/g Group

texts.en:
Jenipher is the facilitator of the Sango W/G group. Jenipher and her group joined One Acre Fund in the year 2011 and will re-enroll in the 2012 program.

With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Jenipher and her group during Kenya’s next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund’s integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance.

Jenipher takes care of six children at home. She joined One Acre Fund in order to grow enough to secure food for her family and to have additional maize profits to send her children to school. With income from her maize sales, Jenipher will educate her child, invest in livestock rearing and pay back loans.

In 2012, the members of Sango W/G group will each plant maize plots between ½ and 1 acre of land.

The photograph shows the members of the group.

loans.use: To source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loans.name: Aurora

texts.es:
La señora Aurora tiene 71 años, es de la ciudad de Concepción, vive con una de sus hijas y un nieto. Ella tiene su negocio de venta de producto de primera necesidad, como ser azúcar, fideos, harina, panificados y demás artículos, con lo cual provee a todos los vecinos de su barrio.
Comenta que tiene muchos clientes y gracias a eso puede obtener los ingresos necesarios para cubrir los gastos de su casa y de esa forma poder salir adelante. Comenta que su  hija le ayuda en su negocio, pues hay días que tiene muchos clientes.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de azúcar, fideos, harina, panificados y demás artículos de primera necesidad con lo cual podrá abastecerse y tener más variedad para sus clientes. Aurora está muy agradecida por la ayuda que fundación paraguaya y kiva le ha dado.
texts.en:
Aurora is 71 years old and from the city of Concepción.  She lives with one of her daughters and a grandson.  Aurora has a business selling basic household products such as sugar, noodles, flour, baked goods and other items, which she supplies to all her neighbors.

Aurora comments that she has many customers and, as a result, she can make the income she needs to cover her household expenses and, in this way, get ahead in life.  She comments that her daughter helps her in her business as there are days when she has many customers.

Aurora is requesting this loan to buy sugar, noodles, flour, baked goods and other basic household products with which she can stock her store and offer her customers more variety.  Aurora is very grateful for the help that Fundación Paraguaya and Kiva have given her.

loans.use: to buy sugar, noodles, flour, baked goods and other items

loans.name: Nalulanda Group

texts.en:
Marth is the facilitator of the Nalulanda group. Marth and his group joined One Acre Fund in the year 2011 and will re-enroll in the 2012 program.

Marth takes care of four children at home. He joined One Acre Fund for One Acre Fund’s best prices and to ensure food security for his family and later educate them. In the recent 2011 season, Marth had an excellent maize yield harvesting 10 bags on ½ acre of land. Before joining One Acre Fund, Martin was only able to harvest four bags of maize on ½ acre of land.

With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Marth and his group during Kenya’s next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund’s integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance.

With income from maize sales, Marth will invest in livestock rearing.

In 2012, the members of Nalulanda group will each plant maize plots between ½ and 1 acre of land.

In the photograph above, Marth is pictured with his group members.

loans.use: To source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loans.name: Rafael

texts.es: Rafael está aplicando a su segundo credikiva, porque quiere comprar bebidas y refrescos fríos para su venta, pues se prepara para fin de año época en el cual repuntan sus ventas. Su anterior credikiva lo invirtió en 30 cajas de cervezas  y 8 de poni Malta, las cuales vendió, reinvirtió y aplico nuevas utilidades a su bienestar y al de su familia. De los financiadores Rafael dice “Gracias a ellos he podido hacer crecer mi negocio y que ha podido mejorar la calidad de vida de él y la de su familia. También expresa que gracias al trabajo en el negocio, se siente una persona útil a su familia y a la sociedad.”
texts.en: Rafael is applying for his second Kiva loan because he wants to buy soft drinks and other beverages to sell. He is getting ready for the end of the year, when he sales increase. His previous Kiva loan was invested in 30 cases of beer and 8 cases of Poni Malta. He sold these, reinvested and used the new profit for his wellbeing and his family's. When speaking of the financiers, Rafael says: "Thanks to them I have been able to make my business grow and been able to improve my own quality of life and my family's." He also expresses that thanks to his work in the business, he feels like a useful person to his family and society.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks and other beverages to sell.

loans.name: Sembrando Esperanza Group

texts.es: Ynes tiene 39 años de edad es madre de 02 hijos, la cual han sido su motivo para seguir adelante. Ella se dedica a la compra y venta ambulatoria de frutas, la cual lleva 07 años laborando de esta manera, este negocio nació ya que su madre se dedica a la siembra y cosecha de frutas pues ella es quien la abastece con las frutas, gracias a su esfuerzo y trabajo a logrado mejorar su vivienda y apoyar a sus hijos. Ynes es madre soltera ella ha tenido que trabajar arduamente para sacar adelante sola a sus hijos.  Ynes solicito el préstamo para invertir en su negocio comprando frutas como tuna, palta y chirimoya y así tener que ofrecer a sus  clientes. A futuro a Ynes le gustaría alquilar un local en un lugar céntrico donde pueda ofrecer sus frutas. Ynes es integrante de la Nueva Alcancía Comunal “Sembrando Esperanza” grupo conformado por 07 mujeres trabajadoras que se comprometen a trabajar bien con el Programa- Prosperidad ellas están muy agradecidos con la ayuda brindada porque pueden hacer posible su progreso.
texts.en:
Ynes is 39 years old and has two children who have been her motivation to get ahead in life.  Her business is selling fruit as an itinerant vendor.  She has been working in this way for seven years.  Her business came about as her mother grows and harvests fruit and she supplies her with her fruit.  Thanks to her efforts and hard work, Ynes has managed to improve her home and support her children.  She is a single mother and has had to work hard to provide for her children on her own.

Ynes requested this loan to invest in her business, buying fruit such as prickly pear, avocados and custard apples, so that she has enough to offer her customers.  In the future, Ynes would like to hire some premises in a central location where she can sell her fruit.

Ynes is a member of the 'Sembrando Esperanza' (Sowing Hope) community bank.  This group is comprised of seven hard-working women who pledge to work well within the Prosperidad (Prosperity) program.  They are very grateful for the help they have been offered because it will enable them to make progress.

loans.use: to buy prickly pear, avocados and custard apples

loans.name: Italo Hipolito

texts.es:
Italo Hipolito tiene 43 años de edad es casado tiene dos hijos, vive con la esposa y con los hijos de trece y un año de edad en Guaranda Sector  Cuatro esquinas Provincia de Bolívar.
LA VRC Cuatro Esquinas Central está formada por 12 socios que pertenecen al sector cuatro esquinas, los socios se dedican a diferentes actividades como son agricultura, crianza de animales, comercio y otros.
Italo se dedica a la Agricultura siembra papas, ganadería  tiene ganado lechero y es chofer. Las compras y las ventas las realiza en el mercado de Guaranda.
Solicita el crédito para comprar ganado. Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudará a comprar el ganado sin ningún tipo de problema.
El sueño es tener casa propia y terreno para pastizales para el ganado.
Los desafíos  es la presencia de heladas en el cultivo de papas.
En los tiempos libres le gusta practicar el deporte y disfrutar de las fiestas del carnaval y San José.
texts.en:
Italo Hipolito is 43 years old, married, and has two children.  He lives with his wife and his children, who are 13 years old and 1 year old, in Guaranda, Cuatro Esquinas, in Bolívar province.

The Cuatro Esquinas Central community bank has 12 members who live in Cuatro Esquinas.  They work in different business activities such as farming, livestock raising, commerce, etc.

Italo is a potato farmer.  He also keeps dairy cows and is a driver.  He makes his purchases and sales in Guaranda market.

Italo is requesting this loan to buy livestock.  The support of this loan will help him to buy his livestock without problems.  His dream is to own his own home and pastureland for his livestock.  The challenge that he faces is frost when he is growing his potatoes.

In his free time, Italo enjoys taking part in sports and enjoying the Carnaval and San José festivities.

loans.use: to buy livestock

loans.name: Meune Njabot Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité Meune njabot a été crée depuis le premier cycle du banc villageois il regroupe 15 membres, toutes originaires du même village. La fondation de ce groupe se justifie par la cohésion et l entente qui règne entre ses membres.leur activité principale reste le commerce de détails.
Madame Sophie responsable du groupe est une femme mariée mère de sept enfant et un enfant qui lui est confié.
Elle est âgée de 43 ans et est membre du banc villageois depuis sa fondation.
Elle est debout à droite de la photo, Sophie fait un petit commerce de détails avec la vente de poissons séchés et du mil, avec son nouveau crédit elle va s'approvisionner de la marchandise pré cité pour mieux développer son activité génératrice de revenu.
Elle dispose dune bonne expérience pour avoir pratiqué cette activité depuis longtemps.
Avec les bénéfices qu'elle aura réalisé elle va payer la scolarité de ses enfants et aider son mari dans certaines charges familiales.
texts.en:
The solidarity group Meune njabot has been created since the first cycle of the "banc villageois" [village bank]. It is composed of 15 members, all from the same village. The foundation of this group is justified by the cohesiveness and understanding that exists between its members. Their main activity is retail trade.
Mrs. Sophie, the group leader, is a married woman, mother of seven children, plus one other child she is taking care of.
She is 43 and has been a member of the "banc villageois" since its foundation.
She is standing on the right side of the photo. Sophie is into small retail trade. She sells dried fish and millet. With this new loan, she will buy these goods in order to further develop her profitable activity.
She is very experienced, as she has been in this field for a long time.
With the profit she will make, she will pay for her children's school fees and help her husband with some family responsibilities.

loans.use: to buy millet and dried fish

loans.name: Duo Las Iluciones Group

texts.es: Maria Filomena: D. 33 años D. edad ella se dedica a la venta D. medicina natural D. forma ambulante,desD. ahce 4 años,ella nos dice que gracias a Dios su venta a aumentado y entonces por eso esta solicitando este credito para la compra D. medicina natural y tener mas variedad en medicina ya que sus clientes le piden otras clases y ella enveses que no tiene,al igual que la suguiente sicia esta solicitando este credito para la compra D. mercaderia para su negocio,y asi D. esa forma aumentar sus ventas.
texts.en: Maria Filomena: 33 years old and sells natural medicines on foot.  She’s been doing this for four years and tells us that, thanks to God, her sales have increased and she is asking for this loan in order to buy natural medicine to have a greater variety because her customers have been requesting different types that she doesn’t have.  Like Maria, Sicia is also requesting this loan to buy merchandise for her business so she can increase her inventory.

loans.use: to buy natural medicines.

loans.name: Laura Matilde

texts.es:
Laura Matilde tiene 35 años de edad es casada tiene un hijo vive en Guaranda Sector Cuatro esquinas Provincia de Bolívar.
LA VRC Cuatro Esquinas Central está formada por 12 socios que pertenecen al sector cuatro esquinas, los socios se dedican a diferentes actividades como son agricultura, crianza de animales, comercio y otros.
Laura se dedica a la crianza de  pollos brailers. Las compras y las ventas los realiza en el mercado de Guaranda.
Solicita el crédito para comprar animales y el alimento para los pollos. Con la ayuda del crédito le ayudará a tener ingresos para poder cubrir las necesidades.
El sueño es comprar terreno. No se le han presentado ningún problema.
En los momentos libres le gusta escuchar música, pasear y disfrutar de las festividades
texts.en:
Laura Matilde is 35 years old, married, and has one son.  She lives in Guaranda, Cuatro Esquinas, in Bolívar province.

The Cuatro Esquinas Central community bank has 12 members who live in Cuatro Esquinas.  The members all work in different business activities such as farming, livestock raising, commerce, etc.

Laura raises broiler chickens.  She makes her purchases and sales in Guaranda market.

Laura is requesting this loan to buy animals and chicken feed.  The support of this loan will help her to make the necessary income to cover her needs.

Laura's dream is to buy land.  She hasn't experienced any problems.

In her free time, Laura likes listening to music, going for walks and enjoying the festivities.

loans.use: to buy animals and chicken feed

loans.name: Saf Sa Jeker Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité Saf Sa jeker a été crée depuis  l inauguration du du banc villageois il est composé de 14 membres,qui sont toutes issus du meme village et partageant des valeurs sociales communes.
Le fondement de ce groupe est basé à partir de leur entente et de l existence de bonnes relations qui les lient depuis longtemps.
Madame Agnès responsable du groupe est une femme veuve agée de 42 ans et mère de deux enfants.
Elle est membre du Banc Villageois depuis sa formation, elle est debout à droite de la photo.
Agnès fait un petit commerce de détail avec la vente de poissons séchés du mil du mais qu elle revend au niveau de son village lors des marchés hebdomadaire.
Avec son nouveau prêt elle va se procurer la marchandises pré cité pour faire marcher son activité génératrice de revenu .
Les bénéfices qu elle réalisé lui permettront d assurer la dépense quotidienne et acheter des manuels scolaires pour ses enfants.
texts.en: The Saf Sa Jeker cooperative group was created at the inauguration of the Banc Villageois.  It is made up of 14 members, all from the same village and sharing common social values.  The group's foundation is based on their longstanding relationships and mutual understanding.  Madame Agnès, the group leader, is a 42-year-old widow and mother of two.  She has been a member of this Banc Villageois since its formation, and is standing at right in the photo.  Agnès has a small retail business selling dried fish, millet, and corn, which she resells in her village at weekly markets.  With her new loan, she will buy more merchandise to increase her revenue.  The profit she makes will allow her to meet her daily expenses and buy school books for her children.

loans.use: to buy dried fish, millet, corn, and peanuts.

loans.name: Yetana Trust A Group

texts.en:
Greetings from Yetana Trust A Group in Western Kenya!  Mark is the facilitator of the Yetana Trust A group. This group joined One Acre Fund in the year 2011 and will re-enroll in the 2012 program.

Mark takes care of three children at home. He joined One Acre Fund in order to access fertilizer and hybrid seeds and ensure food security for his family. In the recent 2011 season, Mark had a good maize yield harvesting six bags on 1/2 acre of land. Before joining One Acre Fund, Mark was only able to harvest five bags of maize on 1/2 acre of land.

With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Mark and his group during Kenya’s next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund’s integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance.

With income from his maize sales, Mark will educate his children, ensure food security and invest in livestock rearing.

In 2012, the members of Yetana Trust A group will each plant between ½ and 1 acre of maize.

The photograph shows the members of the group, with the Field Officer on the far left.

loans.use: To source farming inputs, such as seeds and fertilizer, at low prices for the 2012 planting season.

loans.name: Duo El Durasnal Group

texts.es: Gregoria:D. 59 años D. edad ella se dedica a la agricultura D. verduras,desD. hace 20 años nos cuenta que poco a poco a crecido en su cultivo,y a logrado agrandar mas su siembra,ahora ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra D. abono y semillas y asi D. esa forma seguir cultibando y cosechando ya que por estos tiempos se venD. un poco mas caro la verdura,al igual que la siguiente socia esta solicitando este credito para la compra D. abono y semillas.
texts.en: Gregoria is 59 years old and has been raising vegetables for 20 years.  She says that she grew her crop little by little, making it possible to increase her number of crops.  She is asking for this loan to buy fertilizer and seeds and in this way be able to continue planting and harvesting, especially now that she is able to sell her vegetables for a bit more.  The other lady is also requesting this loan to buy fertilizer and seeds.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seeds.

loans.name: Elvia

texts.es: La señora Elvia tiene 24 años y está casada, han estudiado sólo la primaria, tienen dos hijos de 5 y 2 años, viven a ocho kilómetros de la ciudad en la zona denominada Quenamani, su casa está en una cerranía, como actividad económica se dedican a la cría de ganado lechero, no tienen terrenos de pastoreo, alquilan los pastos y trasladan los  mismos después de cortar hasta su casa y corral, necesitan comprar cáscara de soya para la alimentación de las vacas.  Su actividad está en crecimiento y quieren mejorar las condiciones de vida de sus hijos.
texts.en: Elvia is 24 years old and married.  She only completed her primary education.  She has two children who are 5 and 2 years old.  They live eight kilometers from the city in an area called Quenamani.  Elvia's house is up in the hills.  Her business is raising dairy cows.  She does not own pastureland but rents it.  After her animals have grazed she takes them to her home and pens.  Elvia needs to buy soy husks to feed her cows.  Her business is growing and she would like to improve her children's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy soy husks to feed her cows

loans.name: Sisimukha A Shg Group

texts.en:
Greetings from Sisimukha A SHG Group in Western Kenya! Martha is the facilitator of the Sisimukha A SHG group. This group joined One Acre Fund in the year 2011 and will re-enroll in the 2012 program.

Martha takes care of two children at home. She joined One Acre Fund in order to access fertilizer and hybrid seeds for early land preparation for planting. In the recent 2011 season, Martha had an excellent maize yield harvesting 19 bags on one acre of land. Before joining One Acre Fund, Martha was only able to harvest 10 bags of maize on one acre of land.

With this loan, One Acre Fund will purchase fertilizer, seeds, and other important inputs to distribute to Martha and her group during Kenya’s next planting season in February 2012. The distribution of farming inputs is part of One Acre Fund’s integrated agriculture package, which includes training, reliable input supply (such as fertilizer and seeds), credit and insurance.

With income from her maize sales, Martha will save for the future and ensure food security.

In 2012, the members of Sisimukha A SHG group will each plant between ½ and 1 acre of maize.

In the photo above, Martha is pictured with her group members.

loans.use: To source farming inputs such as seeds and fertilizer at low prices for the 2012 planting season

loans.name: Jonahtan

texts.es: Jonahtan  de 24 años de edad se dedica a la elaboración de cojineria y accesorios para motocicletas. Su negocio nació de su experiencia, porque fue empleado y aprendió el arte de elaboración de sillas y en algún momento se preguntó, si el pudiera hacer lo mismo por su propia cuenta y riesgo; y justamente así lo hizo. Venció muchos desafíos y se sacrificó, pero logró lo que hoy en día es de su propiedad, pues  tiene planes de continuar su crecimiento. Tiene un taller de tapicería y un almacén de repuestos de motocicletas, donde fabrica todos los accesorios asociados a estos vehículos. Su meta más adelante es tener su propia casa, donde pueda ubicar un espacio para su negocio e independizar los ámbitos, familiares y empresariales. Respecto a su negocio sueña con tener varios puntos comerciales, en diversos barrios de la ciudad. Mientras trabaja para cumplir su sueño, maneja una rotación de inventarios de 51 días y una rentabilidad sobre las ventas del 31% indicador financiero desde los cuales planea el crecimiento de su negocio. Su credikiva es el primer financiamiento y lo invertirá en materias primas para elaborar sillas y para comprar cascos, elaborar chalecos y accesorios.
texts.en:
Jonahtan is 24 years old and manufactures upholstery and accessories for motrcycles. His business was born from experience because he was an employee and learned the art of making seats and at one point he asked himself if he could do the same on his own account and taking on the risk; and that is exactly what he did. He overcame many challenges and sacrificed a lot but he managed to establish what is today his own; he plans to continue growing the business. He has an upholstery workshop and a motorcycle parts store where he manufactures all the accessories associated with these vehicles. 

His goal for the future is to have his own house where he can locate his business and free up the space by marrying areas of family and business. With regards his business, he dreams of having several commercial spots in different neighbourhoods in the city. While working to fulfill his dream, he handles an inventory turnover of 51 days and a return on sales of 31%, a financial indicator from which he plans to grow his business. This is his first Kivacredit and he will invest it in buying raw materials with which to manufacture seats, waistcoats and accesories and buy crash helmets.

loans.use: to invest in raw materials for the manufacture of motorbike seats, waistcoats and accessories and buy crash helmets.

loans.name: Rosa Argentina

texts.es:
Rosa Argentina, tiene 60 años de edad, casada hace 28 años, tiene 2 hijos de 23 y 38 años de edad, vive en Las Brisas Tela.
Doña Rosa, muy trabajadora hace 5 años que vende variedad de artículos, juegos de platos, vasos,  cortinas de baño, juegos de ollas, manteles, ropa, zapatos, perfumes, cosméticos etc. Anteriormente vendía cosméticos por catálogos y cuidaba estudiantes.
Su negocio es rentable del cual obtiene ingresos para cubrir gastos del hogar, además obtiene otros ingresos de parte de su hijo mayor.
Los prestamos le han ayudado mucho a mantener surtido y cubrir los pedidos que le hacen, ya tiene bastantes clientes y sus ventas han incrementado. Este es el tercer préstamo y lo esta invirtiendo en compra de artículos para el hogar, ropa interior,  zapatos, carteras y lociones.
Ella se siente muy bien tener esta actividad, con las ganancias  a mejorado su casa, cubre los gastos familiares y su deseo es llegar a tener un vehículo para uso del negocio y dar un mejor servicio al cliente.
texts.en:
Rosa Argentina, 60, has been married for 28 years; she has two children who are 23 and 38 years old and she lives in Las Brisas, Tela.

Rosa is very hardworking and has been selling general merchandise for the last five years.  She sells dinnerware sets, drinking glasses, shower curtains, sets of pots, tablecloths, clothes, shoes, perfume, cosmetics, etc.  She used to sell cosmetics via catalogue and care for students.  Her business is profitable and she earns income to cover household expenses; she also gets additional income from her oldest son.

The loans have helped her a lot to stay well-stocked and fill orders she gets.  She has quite a few customers and sales have increased.  This is the third loan and she is going to use it to buy items for the home, underwear, shoes, purses and lotions.

She feels very good about having this activity.  With profits she’s improved her house, she covers family expenses and her wish is to someday have a vehicle for business use and to provide better customer service.

loans.use: to buy articles for the home, clothing, shoes, purses and lotions to stock her business.

loans.name: Estrellitas Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “ESTRELLITAS” iniciará su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro de Villa Adela, está compuesta por siete integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Margarita es la tesorera. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: elaboración de polleras, compra de tela.

La señora Margarita  indica que este es el primer ciclo que trabaja con Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de una asesora. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de confesión de polleras que viene trabajando hace años atrás. 

El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra de telas) que comprará de las galerias y posteriormente lo comercializará en su local. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia pues ella es casada  y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta los servicios.
texts.en:
A.C. “ESTRELLITAS” (Little Stars) will begin its first loan cycle with Pro Mujer (Pro Woman).  As part of the Centro de Villa Adela, this group is made up of seven members and is managed by a leadership commitee where the lady Margarita is the treasurer.  The businesses that the members of the community association carry out are varied; among them, we have: making polleras (long traditional style pleated skirts), with the purchase of fabric. 

Margarita indicates that this is her first cycle that she has worked with Pro Mujer, joining by the invitation of an assessor.  Currently, she has a skirt making business that she has been working at for many years. 

The loan that she is taking out is to increase her capital, purchasing fabric which she will buy in the galleries and then market in her home.  This form of work permits her to generate resources in order to support her family.  She is married with three children.

When she was asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responded that she likes the services provided.

loans.use: to purchase fabric

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to specialize in bartending.

loans.name: Nestor Roberto

texts.es: El señor Néstor vive en casa alquilada, cuenta con un núcleo familiar compuesto por su esposa e hijo, ambos trabajan vendiendo  dulces, refrescos  y galletas para los niños de una escuela  que se encuentra ubicada al frente de su casa, el destino del crédito es para poder comprar una conservadora que les hace falta para poder exhibir y enfriar los refrescos y gaseosas mini y algunos otros refrescos mas, al mismo tiempo incrementara algunas golosinas, el sr. Néstor es una persona muy trabajadora se siente agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Señor Néstor lives in a rented house and has a family which consists of his wife and son, both of whom work selling pastries, soft drinks and biscuits to school children from the school located directly in front of their house. The loan will be used to buy a product display fridge so as to display and cool the soft drink, cans of carbonated drinks and a few other refreshments. In addition he will buy candies to increase his stock. Señor Néstor is a very hardworking person and feels grateful to the institution for the support given.

loans.use: to buy a product display fridge and candies wholesale.

loans.name: Juan José

texts.es: Juan es el propietario de un  negocio  de comidas rápidas, que inició en el año 1999 vendiendo solamente sopas y que gradualmente fue agregando otros productos como perros calientes, deditos, hasta lograr la larga cola de productos que hoy ofrece. Su primer capital de trabajo fue de treinta mil pesos colombianos, que había reunido cuando trabajaba como conductor de un taxi., actividad que aun practica simultaneo a su negocio que hoy presenta una mejor estructura de trabajo. Su sueño es lograr la adecuación completa del local y de su vivienda, lo que significa bienestar parta toda su familia. En la actualidad está aplicando a su primer credikiva, también primer crédito que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo con el cual realizará adecuaciones a su negocio para proteger a sus clientes de las inclemencias del tiempo.  Su mayor desafió  es lograr el mayor bienestar posible para su familia conformada por 3 hijos en las edades de  18 a 26, con los que sueña verlos convertidos en profesionales de éxito.
texts.en:
Juan has a fast food business, which he started in 1999.  He started by only selling soups, and he gradually added other products like hot dogs and finger foods.  He did this until he managed to have the long line of products that he now offers.

His first working capital was 30,000 COP, which he had gotten together by working as a taxi driver.  He still drives a taxi and has his food business.  He now presents a better work structure.

His dream is to manage the complete improvement of his place and his house.  This would signify the well-being of his family.

He is currently applying for his first Kiva loan.  It is also his first loan with the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.  He will use the loan to make improvements to his business in order to protect his customers from inclement weather.

His greatest challenge is to achieve the greatest well-being possible for his family.  His family is comprised of three children from the ages of 18 to 26.  He dreams of seeing them become successful professionals.

loans.use: to make improvements to his business in order to protect his customers from inclement weather.
